content: the round being careful not to twist rnds 1-5 k1 p1 around round 6 knit drop ca but don t cut rnds 7&8 with cb knit round 9 k2 with cb k1 with ca repeat around drop ca but don t cut rnds 10&11 with cb knit drop cb but don t cut rnds 12&13 with ca knit round 14 k4 k2tog around 20 sts drop ca but don t cut round 15 with cb knit round 16 k3 k2tog around 16 sts round 17 knit drop cb but don t cut round 18 with ca k2 k2tog around 12 sts round 19 knit round 20 k1 k2tog around 8 sts drop ca but don t cut round 21 with cb knit 1 round round 22 k2tog around 4 sts round 23 knit drop cb but don t cut put all 4 sts on 1 needle and work like icord as follows rnds 24-35 knit 3 rnds with ca knit 3 rnds with cb carrying colour not in use up the middle © knitwits heaven original november 2024 allison barrett & lisa vienneau www knitwits-heaven com we do strive for perfection within our patterns but unfortunately sometimes typos occur if you come across a mistake we would love to hear about it so we can make the appropriate corrections thanks so much and happy knitting o ~ 3 ~ round 36 with ca k1 k2tog k1 for 3 sts rnds 37& 38 knit as established in icord rnds 39-41 with cb knit as established in icord rnds 42-53 knit 3 rnds with ca knit 3 rnds with cb as in rnds 24-35 finishing with ca k3tog and pull both ca and cb tails through the loop tassel create a tassel by looping both colours through the hat tip twice and wrapping around the tip to secure pull tightly and thread ends on a sharp needle and pass them down through wraps to secure trim tassel ends as desired © knitwits heaven original november 2024 allison barrett & lisa vienneau www knitwits-heaven com we do strive for perfection within our patterns but unfortunately sometimes typos occur if you come across a mistake we would love to hear about it so we can make the appropriate corrections thanks so much and happy knitting o ~ 4 ~ © knitwits heaven original november 2024 allison barrett & lisa vienneau www knitwits-heaven com we do strive for perfection within our patterns but unfortunately sometimes typos occur if you come across a mistake we would love to hear about it so we can make the appropriate corrections thanks so much and happy knitting o
